snippet.title: Arcade Longplay [982] Circus Charlie (JP)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: KAGE-008

Circus Charlie is an action game originally published in arcades by Konami in 1984. The player controls a circus clown named Charlie in six different circus-themed minigames. It was released for MSX in the same year, followed by ports to the Famicom in 1986 by Soft Pro and the Commodore 64 in 1987.

This version features a trampoline level that isn't featured in other versions of the game. However, you can only play 5 rounds of each one, except for the trapeze level which is unlimited. You also get points based on how fast you've reached the goal point.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
